name: Planet Driver Prototype
description:
PLANET DRIVER PROTOTYPE

Game inspired by Brackeys entry for Ludum Dare 46! Planning on adding a Tornado level and maybe multiplayer Last Man Standing type games depending on what you all think :)

There are bugs lol ngl.

AIM

- Dodge craters and meteors.

- Collect 5(I think) rock Pick Ups that are around the planet to increase the planets size.

- You will know when you won when you see the win screen but its hard lol.

CONTROLS

- A and D to move left and right.

- SPACE BAR to jump.
